Name: Tales of the Past and Present: Ragunna City
Description: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Ragunna City to her.
QuestDesc: Fuling in Egla Town is collecting these pages of scattered books. Go and deliver the pages found in Ragunna City to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's about the Ragunnesi plays... They seem to be similar to hero plays. People turn their experiences and stories into scripts and perform them on stage.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wuli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sounds like fun. We should go see one sometime.
